name: Black & Rust Orange Floral Print Tiered Midi Fit & Flare Dress with Ruffles
reviews: I purchased this dress after reading a lot of good reviews. Fabric is feather light, print is nice, it's sleeve and neck design are good. But in the product I received, there were lot of extra thread stitching faults. Finishing was not upto the standard. There were fabric ends unstitched and unfinished. Because it's dark color it's not prominently visible but for the price paid I would say the finishing of the product was poor. So overall design was good but finishing was poor for the price. I have purchased better quality dresses on Myntra at lower prices. So this review is in comparison with those and the prices. Dress looks nice when you were and click pictures and flaws are not visible. But if you are like me particular about those small details then I don't recommend buying this one.

reviews: These toddler shoes offer exceptional comfort, breathability, and flexibility, making them ideal for active little ones. The bendable soles mimic natural foot movement, promoting healthy development, while the non-skid design enhances safety by preventing slips. Toddlers can easily remove the shoes independently; however, they may require assistance when putting them on. The high-quality materials and construction suggest impressive durability, ensuring they withstand the rigors of daily toddler activities.

name: Unisex Perforated Mercedes Drift Cat Ultra Sneakers
reviews: I recently bought the PUMA Motorsport White Mercedes Drift Cat Sneaker, a shoe designed to merge racing style with everyday comfort, and here's my take after wearing it for a few weeks. At ‚Çπ2449, the Mercedes Drift Cat Sneaker a good balance between style, performance, and comfort. For motorsport fans or anyone who appreciates a stylish, functional shoe, it's definitely worth the investment. Overall, the shoe is a solid choice for anyone looking for a stylish yet functional shoe that can transition from the track to casual wear. While it might feel a bit stiff initially, it breaks in well and delivers excellent performance in both driving and everyday activities. I'd recommend it to motorsport enthusiasts and those seeking a sleek, versatile sneaker. Design:4.5/5 Comfort:4.5/5 Performance:5/5 Value for Money:4/5

The shoes are also lightweight and breathable, which adds to their all-day wearability. The grip on the sole is great for both indoor and outdoor use, and the material quality feels premium and durable. Cleaning them is also easy, which is a plus for white shoes. Highly recommended if you're looking for stylish, comfortable, and reliable everyday sneakers.
